title: Temperatures plunge overnight as week-long cold snap hits UK
text:
Series 11 - 12 • BAFTA-nominated breakfast show covering the latest news, sport & weather
Temperatures plunge overnight as week-long cold snap hits UK
• The UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA) has issued cold weather health alerts for all of England ahead of a week of low temperatures.
